text: Mortality rate and prevalence of diarrhea or respiratory illness, which were included in variable costs, impacted the total cost. The average cost, including the risk of each calf being healthy or experiencing diarrhea, totaled (mean ± SD) $5.39 ± 14.42 per calf. The average cost per BRD case was $0.70 ± 7.33 per calf. Preventative health costs added an additional $9.22 to each calf.
